message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $1,350,000 to make this deal worthwhile. Let's meet in the middle.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $1,350,000. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000, but no more than that. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand we're close but $1,250,000 still doesn't work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway,  let's go with $1,300,000. It's a fair compromise and allows both of us to walk away happy.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,300,000. I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
